summary: This mod increases the blood splatter size, making the game more bloody :)
descriptionHtml:
Bigger Blood Splatters
--------------------------------
WARNING: If you have any merchant mods, load them ABOVE this mod in your load order.
 
The mod increases the default blood splatter size by 10x, makes the blood on your weapon last longer, and makes blood on the ground or surfaces last longer also, resulting in more gore :)
In future versions i can make the size even bigger if you want.

DETAILED CHANGES:
--------------------------
Between 2x and 10x the size of blood decals, blood on weapons lasts for 100x longer, and blood on the ground lasts for 10x longer. :D

Changelog:
-----------------
*1.1:
Fixed merchant bug

Enjoy!
author: GOXSTRAP
